item.title: Under Par Golf Architect launches April 16 for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC
item.content:encoded:
Under Par Golf Architect will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on April 16, publisher and developer Broken Arms Games announced. The console versions are newly announced. A demo will be available for PC from today until March 2 as part of Steam Next Fest: February 2026 Edition.

Here is an overview of the game, via Broken Arms Games:

About

Design and manage prestigious courses around the world.

Step into the shoes of a golf architect as you build and manage your own golfing paradise! Sharpen your strategy by designing incredible courses to challenge the most demanding golfers and watch your club flourish as you attract VIP players, hire quirky staff and hold prestigious tournaments.

Design

Design world-class golf courses by terraforming rough wasteland into lush fairways for smooth drives and pristine greens to ensure a true roll for every putt. Raise and lower terrain and lay the course for rivers and lakes to craft breathtaking landscapes that will fill your golfers with awe. Every course you create is a masterpiece waiting to be explored!

Build

Build and maintain your golfing paradise to keep your members happy and entertained with bars, pools, restaurants and training facilities. Hire the right staff for the job to ensure services are top-notch quality. Manage your budget wisely as you expand your course with new holes and amenities, balancing the demands of profitability with the pursuit of perfection. Golfer membership will ensure your profit and the growth of your first-class resort!

Play

Play your own course and test your skills against challenging layouts and unpredictable hazards, from towering trees to treacherous water features. Simple controls and a point and click mechanic will let you test the par of every hole to ensure they’re up to scratch for your members. Don’t want to play but still like to experience the challenges of your design? Click on the teeing area to simulate the game!

Customize

Customize your golf course across a range of different biomes, from bustling cities to some of the most remote regions in the world. Experiment with different landscaping elements to evoke a variety of atmospheres, from classic elegance to modern extravagance. VIP golfers love exclusivity; if they can only reach your course by helicopter they’ll do it, but it needs to be worth their while—fine-tune every detail to suit their preferences and taste!

After establishing a thriving club in a suburban town setting, are you ready to tackle the challenges of running a larger golf resort?

  • Invest in improving your facilities, upgrading equipment, hiring skilled staff, and optimizing course layouts to attract more members and increase revenue. Watch as your club’s prestige and profitability soar with each successful upgrade.
  • Train and develop your staff, enhancing their skills and abilities to provide top-notch service and keep operations running smoothly.
  • Utilize comprehensive statistical analysis tools to assess your club’s performance, identifying areas for improvement and making strategic adjustments to maximize profitability. Adjust membership fees and tournament entry prices to optimize revenue streams while keeping your members satisfied.
  • Manage a diverse team of staff members with unique personalities and work styles, ensuring a harmonious work environment while driving toward your financial goals. Balance the needs of your workforce with your ambitious growth plans as you strive to turn your golf club into a thriving business venture.

item.title: Silly Polly Beast version 1.2 update now available, adds third-person camera mode
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Available in New Game Plus.

Publisher Top Hat Studios and developer Anji Games have released the version 1.2 update for psychological survival action horror game Silly Polly Beast, which adds a new third-person camera mode.

Third-person mode is an extra mode available in New Game Plus, and is unlocked after completing the game for the first time. In New Game Plus, you can choose which camera mode to use, and freely switch between them at any point from the options menu. However, some locations are shown in a cinematic view no matter whether you choose the cinematic camera or third-person camera. The update also features several other improvements and quality-of-life features.

Silly Polly Beast is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam.
